mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_AUTH_USER A ,TB_DEPT B WHERE 1=1 AND A.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_CD AND USER_NM like '%${userNm}%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_AUTH_USER (USER_ID, AUTH_GRP_CD, DEPT_CD, USER_NM, PASSWORD, USER_STATUS_CD, EMAIL, JOIN_DATE) VALUES (#{userId}, '1', #{deptCd}, #{userNm}, #{password}, '1', #{email}, '2024-04-29')
